title: Rotating Gamemode question
body:
just wondering what are the order of the game modes?? just want urf back xD soon but want to know how long
Thanks

replies.body: Last time we had URF, it was after Ascension in the schedule. **IF** the schedule order doesn't change then URF should be on 1st of July.
Do you know if Doom Bots will be returning at all?

[**Riot L4T3NCY**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance/xYncNW8G-rotating-game-mode-update-brain-dump?comment=00000000) said that Doom Bots might be implemented into the rotating queue once it's been up for a while. As I understand it was very script intensive, so coding for all the new bots will be a challenge.

As a side note though, [**Riot FeralPony**](http://ask.fm/RiotFeralPony/answers/137246540806) did say they were developing new modes for the rotating queue. This indicates **Riot** is keen to add new content to the rotating queue, so I'd say it's likely we'll get Doom Bots again sometime in the future.
